verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> There <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%>, a <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>:

The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4461>Rabbi<s%>, we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G2064>art<s%> a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4592>miracles<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G4160>doest<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G281>Verily<s%>, <S%G281>verily<s%>, I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G3362>Except<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G509>again<s%>, he <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>. again: or, from above

<S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> when he <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1088>old<s%>? <S%G3361>can<s%> <S%G1410><s%> he <S%G1525>enter<s%> the second <S%G1208>time<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G2836>womb<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%>?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%>, <S%G281>Verily<s%>, <S%G281>verily<s%>, I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G3362>Except<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, he <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

That which is <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> that which is <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>.
<S%G2296>Marvel<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G5209>Ye<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G509>again<s%>. again: or, from above

The <S%G4151>wind<s%> <S%G4154>bloweth<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> it <S%G2309>listeth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> thou <S%G191>hearest<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1492>canst<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>tell<s%> <S%G4159>whence<s%> it <S%G2064>cometh<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4226>whither<s%> it <S%G5217>goeth<s%>: <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> every <S%G3956>one<s%> that is <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.
<S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%>?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1488>Art<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> a <S%G1320>master<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1097>knowest<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>?

<S%G281>Verily<s%>, <S%G281>verily<s%>, I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, We <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we do <S%G1492>know<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3140>testify<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> we have <S%G3708>seen<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3141>witness<s%>.

<S%G1487>If<s%> I have <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> earthly <S%G1919>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G4459>how<s%> shall ye <S%G4100>believe<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> of heavenly <S%G2032>things<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> hath ascended <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G1508>but<s%> he that came <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, even the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> lifted <S%G5312>up<s%> the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>, even <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> be lifted <S%G5312>up<s%>:

<S%G3363>That<s%> <S%G3956>whosoever<s%> <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G622>should<s%> <S%G3363>not<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G5620>that<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> only <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3956>whosoever<s%> <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G622>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2919>condemn<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> might be <S%G4982>saved<s%>.

He that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2919>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2919>condemned<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> he that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> is <S%G2919>condemned<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G4100>hath<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the only <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2920>condemnation<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G1063>because<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> every <S%G3956>one<s%> that <S%G4238>doeth<s%> <S%G5337>evil<s%> <S%G3404>hateth<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> should be <S%G1651>reproved<s%>. reproved: or, discovered

<S%G1161>But<s%> he that <S%G4160>doeth<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> may be made <S%G5319>manifest<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2038>wrought<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> he <S%G1304>tarried<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G907>baptizing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G137>Aenon<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> to <S%G4530>Salim<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3854>came<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G907>baptized<s%>.
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G2214>question<s%> <S%G3326>between<s%> some <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2491>John's<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2512>purifying<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4461>Rabbi<s%>, <S%G3739>he<s%> that <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>, to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> barest <S%G3140>witness<s%>, <S%G2396>behold<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G907>baptizeth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> it <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>. receive: or, take unto himself

<S%G5210>Ye<s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G1565>him<s%>.

He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G3565>bride<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G5384>friend<s%> of the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2476>standeth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heareth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5463>rejoiceth<s%> <S%G5479>greatly<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3566>bridegroom's<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>: <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> is <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%>.
<S%G1565>He<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G837>increase<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1691>I<s%> must <S%G1642>decrease<s%>.

He that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> from <S%G509>above<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>: he that <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>earthly<s%> <S%G1093><s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>: he that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he hath <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> he <S%G3140>testifieth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2983>receiveth<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%>.
He that hath <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> hath set to his <S%G4972>seal<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> he <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>giveth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G3358>measure<s%> unto him.
The <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G25>loveth<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> hath <S%G1325>given<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.

He that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> he that believeth <S%G544>not<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G3700>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
